main event: On August 19, 1954, a shiny object with a dome-shaped underside was observed for 20 seconds as it flew horizontally at an elevation of 1,000 yards before disappearing to the south.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and reddish-white in color., The object maintained a fixed position for a few seconds before rapidly accelerating., The sighting lasted for approximately 1-2 minutes., Witnesses included the report writer's sister and cousin who were in a car., The report suggests possible explanations including it being a balloon or an aircraft.
witness description: The witness was a 19-year-old male student traveling with family members.
